text.text_translated: I used to work a normal five-day week. After my new baby, I took some time off work. I wanted to spend more time with my children before they started school. I talked with my boss, and we agreed to a three-day work week. Of course, this also meant a big cut in my pay. This is because I am paid for the number of days I work. However, I have noticed my amount of work has not changed at all. I now do five days of work in only three days. But I am getting paid much less for it.

feedback.feedback: PASS. The text is a perfect example of B1 writing. Sentences are short and clear. Vocabulary is simple and appropriate. Complex ideas like 'parental leave' and 'pro-rata' were correctly simplified without losing meaning. The text is factually accurate.
